snippet: Twelve acts from five continents, from the Cape Verdean singer Mayra Andrade to the Chinese jew’s-harp master Wang Li, performed at Webster Hall on Sunday night.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performances at Globalfest world-music showcase at Webster Hall.
lead_paragraph: Twelve acts from five continents, from the Cape Verdean singer Mayra Andrade to the Chinese jew’s-harp master Wang Li, performed at Webster Hall on Sunday night.

headline.main: A Night When All the World’s Onstage
headline.print_headline: A Night When All the World’s Onstage
